content: Chao Huang is now a research assistant in the Chinese University of Hong Kong, advised by Prof. Chi-Wing Fu. He got the B.S. from EE Department, Nanjing University in 2019, working with Prof. Zhan Ma.
summary: Chao Huang is now a research assistant in the Chinese University of Hong Kong, advised by Prof. Chi-Wing Fu. He got the B.S. from EE Department, Nanjing University in 2019, working with Prof. Zhan Ma.
title: Chao Huang

summary: Submitted to SIAM Journal on Imaging Sciences
title: Compressive Sampling for Array Cameras
Extreme Image Compression via Multiscale Autoencoders With Generative Adversarial Optimization
